extendedInfo.description: "Accupedo Pedometer Widget made good walking buddies in our last tests." [Washington Post, 10/1/12] "Among cellphone apps the Accupedo pedometer widget for Android phones had the top spot." [LA Times, 12/28/11]Accupedo-Pro is an accurate Pedometer Widget that monitors your daily walking on the Home screen. ++++ ATTENTION ++++  Test with a free Accupedo to see if your phone works well with Accupedo-Pro before purchasing it. Some phones do not support the G-sensor in SLEEP (STANDBY, when screen is OFF) mode by those phone manufacturers. This is not a defect of this app.An intelligent 3D motion recognition algorithm is embedded to track only walking patterns by filtering and ejecting out non walking activities. Accupedo counts your steps regardless of where you put your phone like your pocket, waist belt, or bag. Be healthy by setting up your daily goal and accurately monitoring your steps with Accupedo. ++++ Features  ++++â The intelligent algorithm starts tracking after 4-12 CONSECUTIVE steps, then stops and restarts automatically as you walk.â Customizable widget display modes: steps, distance, minutes, calories, and Lap.â Daily log history: step counts, distance, calories, and walking time.â Charts: Daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly step counts.â Customized power usage mode options for efficient power saving.â Customized personal settings: sensitivity, metric/english, step distance, body weight, daily goal, etc.â Concise widget display on Home screen.â A âodometerâ function for steps (Lap)â Resume/Pause/Resetâ Widget skin colors: black, blue, green, orange, pinkâ Screen on/off optionâ Email a daily log fileâ Database import and exportâ Manual step count addition and subtractionâ Language option: default and English ++++ Installation  ++++â After downloading, press and hold your finger on the EMPTY space of the Home screen. (If your Home screen is FULL of Apps, remove at least two adjacent App because Accupedo-Pro needs two App space to install it.) âAdd to Home screenâ menu will appear with options listing.â Select Widgets from the menu, and then select the widget named âAccupedo-Proâ.â Try moving it around by pressing and holding your finger on the widget.â WATCH YOUTUBE FOR INSTALLATION VIDEO (Type in Accupedo)  for more information.  ++++  Notes  ++++ â It works only for an Android phone with G-sensor (accelerometer).â It performs best when the phone is on your waist belt.â Step count may not be accurate if you put your phone in loose fit pants due to the random movement your phone makes in the pocket.â The sensitivity of a phone can be different from others. So, choose a sensitivity level that works best for your phone.â Help and FAQ are built in the App.

reviews.title: Use to love this app.
reviews.comment: Ever since I downloaded the uprade it no longer changes mph...stays the same when I am walking or running. Should have have left well enough alone...oh well I have learned.
reviews.author: linda williams

reviews.title: Excellent app, thank you!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the free version happily for more than a month now, it\'s really great, easy to use, accurate count, weekly/monthly/yearly summary in clean chart diagram... I\'m buying the pro version just to say thank you :)
reviews.author: Yishu Liu

reviews.title: Not Happy!
reviews.comment: Why does the walk count reset to zero after midnight? I take late-night walks because of the convenience and because it clears my head. I find it annoying and quite irritating that this app resets itself after midnight. Fix that issue and I\'ll give 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love the app, but...
reviews.comment: I\'m having issues with importing the database from Google Drive. I flashed my phone and am trying to restore my database, but the application isn\'t finding the file. It\'s annoying as I can actually see it in Drive. Any ideas?
reviews.author: Dan Richardson

reviews.title: Impressive start -- update -- the \'app\' is less impressive
reviews.comment: ** Update **  I find for every 100 steps I take the \'app\' tells me (on average) I take 107 steps. That\'s a 7% error rate.  To the owners, is there something I can do to correct this or do we need an update?  As an interim measure I\'m taking 7% off the daily stats.
reviews.author: Phil Reed

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: I have used this app, for more than a year before I went pro.
reviews.author: Joanna A. Bruno

reviews.title: Excellent app, best pedometer on GoogleP
reviews.comment: P
reviews.author: Phillip Cunningham

reviews.comment: Love it!
reviews.author: Bradley Siegel

reviews.title: Best of his kind
reviews.comment: Motivate to stay healthy and daily log to easily see your progress over time. Great support from the developer!
reviews.author: Alexandre L\303\251gar\303\251

reviews.title: screen needs to remain on
reviews.comment: note 2, screen needs to remain on for it to count anything. useless. if it could count with the screen off, it might be good.
reviews.author: Leonidas Trebuchet

reviews.title: Awesome pedometer
reviews.comment: The 5 mile/day goal is a life changer.  The app is accurate and inspiring.
reviews.author: George Hairston

reviews.title: Hiker
reviews.comment: Used app for a while and was very happy with it. However, since updating to new version it no longer recorded in sleep mode. Therefore, I gave it two stars. BUT customer care was so efficient and helpful at trying to fix issue that it\'s now 4 stars. I\'ll add another once the fix is sorted!
reviews.author: Paul Rimmer

reviews.comment: love this app.
reviews.author: shannon Siffles

reviews.title: No total distance summary?
reviews.comment: I don\'t care about the steps as much as the miles I\'ve walked for an entire month or entire week or the averages the same way you guys display it for steps! Give me the distance!
reviews.author: Sandra Buensalida

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and clear data displays.
reviews.author: Sean Allen

reviews.title: Latest version poor
reviews.comment: Poor tracking
reviews.author: Robert Banach

reviews.comment: Does one thing really well
reviews.author: Gilbert Eliott

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: I have been using the app since December 2012. Every month since my step count has increased. I love those 10,000+ days. Its my reminder and encouragement to stay fit.
reviews.author: Matthew Hogan

reviews.title: Best in class
reviews.comment: The app works well. Feature request: calibrate the step (once) by using the sensors and GPS for more accurate measurement...and automatic sensing between walking and running paces. The settings are completely different from my old Galaxy s2; the sensors on the s4 are much more sensitive. Edit: Thanks for the Google backup! Now if only or were automatic or on schedule ;)
reviews.author: Raul E. Fernandez

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Would be great if you backed up your step count online.  Means that unlike other fitness apps I use,  you lose your data if you have an issue with your phone Update July 2013 now able to backup to Google drive -  brilliant
reviews.author: Neil Finegan
